title: Wildheart
content:
Poisoned targets Maim them (No move, Disadvantage DEX Saves) it for 1 turn. Level 8 - Land's Stride: Difficult Terrain (Subclass Feature) Level 10 - Choose an Animal Aspect (Subclass Feature)

Bear: Carrying capacity is doubled, Advantage on Strength Checks. Chimpanzee: Resistance to Falling damage, throwing camp supplies Blinds targets. Crocodile: Movement on water-based surfaces increased by 3m. On slippery surfaces, gain Advantage on Saving Throws against being knocked Prone. Eagle: Darkvisio
